Posts.Content: May 6, 2011 02:08PM VLAZ wrote: Hi Everyone, I am starting with AC on May 18, 4 cycles every 2 wks. Then 12 wks of Taxol. I'm stressed about side effects. I feel like it would help to get exercise and be strong, but I'm still recovering from surgery so really can't do too much yet. I'm happy to discover this community! Warm thoughts to all!!
Posts.Title: Chemo May 2011 Cyborg

Posts.Content: May 10, 2011 08:54AM VLAZ wrote: For people who've already started losing hair, is it a good idea to have hair cut short before this happens? I've read that it is, but I kind of want to keep my longish hair for as long as I can. Any wisdom will be welcome! Thanks!
